website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Leadoff Low RM’s comment section is full of good reviews from shoppers. Aside from being comfortable, the shoe also hits the spot in terms of fit and price. The brand also did not slack off in terms of the shoe’s aesthetics since users only have high praises for it.
pros: Most buyers of the Under Armour Leadoff Low RM baseball cleat report that the shoe is comfortable
An overwhelming number of shoppers say that the cleat is worth its price
Numerous wearers of this Under Armour baseball cleat say that it has a good fit
A handful of shoppers appreciate the overall look of the pair
The Under Armour cleat is affordable
Some reviewers reported that the pair has excellent traction
A few several other users noted that the shoe is true to size
One reported that the cleat delivers excellent support
Another buyer says that the pair is lightweight
cons: Several reviewers report that the shoe is a bit tight around the toe area
Some customers say that the shoe had some durability issues and does not last as long

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice great value better than expected I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, Great value- well worth it. Interesting feel when running from Clay dirt to turf then grass. I think there a better alternatives for turf? But more than adequate in the Clay and on the grass. Would definitely recommend. Paid in the ballpark of $35-$40.
customer_reviews.author: Joey D

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and looks good
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son is pleased with how it fits and looks. No complains so far. I might downgrade my rating if the product turns out to be not durable enough. In short it should last for at least 1 year
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable excellent traction
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 11 year old. He had the same kind in a smaller size last year. They are comfortable and easy to slip on and off AND excellent traction on dry or wet fields. The only bad thing is the laces, they untied even after double knotting, we had to switch the laces but all in all great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: KLMW

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The shoes work great, we have three kids in baseball using them and they match most color schemes. BUY half a size larger than your kid's running shoe size. We've had to return multiple pairs because it is too snug for their standard shoe sizes.
customer_reviews.author: TheChanClan

customer_reviews.title: In love with the colors on these
customer_reviews.text: In love with the colors on these! Bought for my husband and he seems to like them as well! Gonna be good on the fields.
customer_reviews.author: Brandith Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and performance
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these baseball shoes for the past 2 months and love them. Comfortable, fit perfectly, and have stood up well thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic D

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Men's Leadoff Low RM Cleats
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and not damaged. Cleats fit as expected, and are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: randy21mTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats. Got into a weekly softball league and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats. Got into a weekly softball league and needed something to wear. They fit great and are holding up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: rivalrider

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: My son says they're comfy (for cleats). They fit as expected. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy J

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: More amazing than pictures even show! Fit is true to size. Excellent:)
customer_reviews.author: Jw

customer_reviews.title: good cleats for softball
customer_reviews.text: fit just as expected. look good. feel good on my feet..
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cleat
customer_reviews.text: Needed cleats in record time and they delivered. Good quality. Comfortable. And unique design. Money well spent, which is something I don’t often say with cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 13-year-old son and he likes them quite a bit. They fit well and he thinks they look very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer cblues

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes and they were reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Nieuwendyk-25

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love it, fits perfectly, comfortable and it came just in time for the softball tournament. Feel so good it made my mvp of the tourney even better. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: The product fit exactly as I thought it would. Very comfortable, Would recommend if your looking for a sturdy cleat.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Scott

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and very well made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves these cleats. They are comfortable and very well made. I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha 808

customer_reviews.title: Great baseball cleats
customer_reviews.text: This was the only brand that had plastic bottom baseball cleats in the large enough size that we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband plays in a softball league and he loves these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Cricket Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would love this just a bit wider , but very comfortable and feels great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Tegarden

customer_reviews.title: Nice baseball cleats.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Delivered as expected. Fit as expected. Overall good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Murray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 13 year old son and he absolutely loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fit! While playing softball
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit! While playing softball, they feel like an extension of my feet! No break in period necessary, either.
customer_reviews.author: Dean A. Long

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and fit like they should. My daughter has gotten many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves these shoes I bought for him for Christmas. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle and Wayne Santom

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent looking pair of cleats. Cannot wait for this upcoming season to show these off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and look fantastic. Another great product from UA.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Pierce

customer_reviews.title: ... about the make of the cleats that makes them pretty uncomfortable in the toe area
customer_reviews.text: I there is something about the make of the cleats that makes them pretty uncomfortable in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11, these seemed a little snug but performed well. I made it through the uncomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Cluecheck

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took almost twice as long as projected to get here. Shoe fits well and appears to be constructed well.
customer_reviews.author: Dean E Vertz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I orderd soccer cleats not baseball now my daughter can’t play thanks
customer_reviews.author: James Allen

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Leadoff Low Rm Baseball Cleats Shoe
product_meta.description: Synthetic leather upper provides exceptional step-in comfort with added durability & support . Mesh tongue adds enhanced breathability to keep feet cool & dry all game long . Full-length EVA midsole for added comfort, cushioning & help dispersing cleat pressure. Rubber Molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability for all field surfaces. Weight: 13 oz.
feature_bullets: Synthetic leather upper provides exceptional step in comfort with added durability & support
Mesh tongue adds enhanced breathability to keep feet cool & dry all game long
Full length EVA midsole for added comfort, cushioning & help dispersing cleat pressure
Rubber Molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability for all field surfaces
